oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Shams, Pīr Ḥasan Shāh ... [et al.].
Binding in poor condition, several pages torn or in brittle condition.
Includes Index on the reverse side of t.p.
Ends with a prayer in Sindhi by scribe who, being the abode of defects, seeks forgiveness for mistakes.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.

With: Ārtī / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; [Ćoga]ḍīā:sāñjījā:pañj / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Shams ; [Veñtī] / Pīr Ḥasan Shāh Sawāī, Pīr Ḥasan Shāh, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, ... [et al.] ; [Yā Khûdāvañdh] / Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn, Pīr Imām Shāh, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, ... [et al.] ; Ćogaḍīā:sûbhûajā:24 / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; Gaṭpāṭjā:ginān:9 / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn, Shamsī, ... [et al.] ; Ginān:bhībhī:emām:bhegamjā:joḍīlā:8 / Pīr Imām Begum, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn.
